thread.title: John Terry offered new one-year deal at Chelsea as 36-year-old gets set to stay at Stamford Bridge for an extra season
thread.title_full: John Terry offered new one-year deal at Chelsea as 36-year-old gets set to stay at Stamford Bridge for an extra season

author: aterrell
title: John Terry offered new one-year deal at Chelsea as 36-year-old gets set to stay at Stamford Bridge for an extra season
text:
EFL Blue deal John Terry offered new one-year deal at Chelsea as 36-year-old gets set to stay at Stamford Bridge for an extra season 
Club captain has been in and out of Antonio Conte's first team but could put pen to paper on a 12-month deal alongside Eden Hazard Breaking 31st March 2017, 11:28 am Updated: 31st March 2017, 11:41 am
